title: ovl-sysmodule
author: WerWolv
details: A Tesla overlay that allows you to toggle sysmodules on the fly
changelog:
1.3.0

Toggling a Sysmodule from On to Off now also automatically prevents it from auto starting.
If you'd still like to have the sysmodule auto start and only have it disabled until the next reboot, you can override it by pressing Y instead.

1.2.2

Update for latest Atmosphere + libnx hid changes

1.2.1

Updated nx-ovlloader ProgramID to prevent killing it after the update

1.2.0

@HookedBehemoth decided to redo the entire thing building a much prettier interface and add some extra features:

Added ability to toggle sysmodules that need a reboot
Added ability to toggle sysmodule auto booting
Redid the UI to make it look a lot cleaner
Updated to libtesla v1.3.1 to make use of all the new features

1.1.0

Compatibility update for latest libtesla release
